title: Initial Entry
description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad.

title: Troubleshooting a Locked Screen
description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and system doesn't respond), repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank and the red light blinks. This indicates the system has reset.

title: Re-entry After Reset
description: Once the screen is blank and the red light blinks, enter the four-digit code again to access the system.

title: Important Note
description: The order of the four digits doesn't matter when entering the code.

title: Successful Entry Confirmation
description: The system will indicate successful entry by allowing access (e.g. unlocking, opening).
